attributes.action: Reduce 50% problem of the government through devoloping a project
attributes.additional_details:
Respected Sir,
 I have developed a real life project documentation. which need only to develop by industrial expert and analyst .This project can reduce 50% problem of the government. Like scam, cash theft, kidnapping, To stop black male, bribery, crime, terrorist and criminal activities, To stop black money uses, To refund black money, tax recovery, to stop illegal transaction etc. By this Project a nation can grow toward as a developed country under the actual growth rate also help to the nation to achieve the actual growth rate. In this situation government can pay the attention at how to grow the nation. when government’s internal problem will be reduced than nation will automatically grow. Please inform to the government about it. if this project is valuable to the nation contact me on my email as soon as possible .Thanks for giving your valuable time Email: meruddin@gmail.com
